price: Lalle ne waɗanda suka yi taƙawa idan wani tãshin hankali daga Shaiɗan ya shãfe su, sai su tuna (Allah) sai gã su, sun zama masu basĩra.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittaqaw idhā massahum ṭāifun mina al-shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mub'ṣirūna
